constructor.details: Contract constructor sets initial beneficiaries, mediator, observer, the reservoir measurement unit and total capacity

params._beneficiaries: List of countries/ states that would share the reservoir water.
params._mediator: Organization/ country/ state that would facilitate the reservoir capacity sharing agremeent among the beneficiaries
params._observer: Organizations/ entity that would engage in implementing the terms of the reservoir capacity sharing agreement

params.fractions: List of water allocation fractions for each beneficiary in the same order as the beneficiaries list.
params.votingEndTime: Unix timestamp of when the voting ends
params.votingStartTime: Unix timestamp of when the voting can begin

proposeNewAllocation(address[],uint256[].return: isSuccess A boolean indicating whether or not the update operation succeeded.

updateReservoirWaterLevel(uint256).return: isSuccess A boolean indicating whether or not the update operation succeeded.
